elements.label: 临时影响
elements.description: 这是会被火力覆盖催坏的影响

elements.label: Woods
elements.description: Not the Wood, thankfully. We can hide here without having to worry about being devoured. Usually.

elements.label: Stellar Residue
elements.description: Remnants of power, cast off from the body of the star as it raced down from heaven. Ephemeral, but potent.
